document_data.name: Elder Rune
document_data.mainbody: The '''Elder Rune''' was a cabal of [[lich]]es who sought to discover a "master" rune that could control other [[rune magic|magical runes]]. It was their ambition to use this rune to control and subvert [[magic]]al effects such as wards, bindings, ''[[gate]]s'', and ''[[portal]]s''.
document_data.Rumors & Legends: One of the goals of the [[Vellurith]], a game of manipulation played among the [[beholder]]s of [[Toril]], was to influence the Elder Rune (or similar lich cabals) toward goals outside of [[Faer√ªn]] and the affairs of beholderkind.{{Cite web/Forging the Realms/The Vellurith, Part One}}
